text: Phalata si sihamtaka prabancanara dbaraa padaskhalita karaile. Iyara pichata yetiya sihamte se'i gachara phala khale, tetiya sihamtara lajjasthana sihamtara ocarata prakasa hai ga’la, arau sihamte jannatara paterae nijake abrta karaiba dharaile. Tetiya sihamtara pratipalake sihamtaka mati ka’le, ‘ma'i tomalokaka e'i gachajopara paraa nisedha karaa nachilone? Arau ma'i tomalokaka koraa nachilone ye, niscaya cayatana tomaloka ubhayarae prakasya satrau
